mapper.select:
SELECT ccp.period_date grade, ctt.NAME teacherName, so.NAME majorName, ifnull( count( eas.student_id ), 0 ) studentNum, ctt.id teacherId, ctt.major_id majorId FROM cc_course_periode ccp LEFT JOIN cc_teacher ctt ON ctt.major_id = ccp.major_id LEFT JOIN ep_adviser_student eas ON ctt.id = eas.teacher_id AND eas.grade = ccp.period_date and eas.is_del=0 LEFT JOIN sys_office so ON so.id = ctt.major_id WHERE ccp.major_id = #{majorId} AND ctt.is_del = 0 AND ccp.course_type = 2
GROUP BY ctt.NAME ORDER BY ctt.id

SELECT count(ces.student_id) studentNum FROM ( select * from cc_course_periode where major_id=#{majorId} and course_type = 2 and is_del=0 order by period_date desc limit 1 ) ccp LEFT JOIN cc_educlass_student ces ON ces.class_id = ccp.class_id AND ces.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN ep_adviser_student eas ON ccp.period_date = eas.grade AND ccp.major_id = eas.major_id AND ces.student_id = eas.student_id AND eas.is_del=0 WHERE eas.id IS NULL

SELECT eas.id, eas.student_id studentId, cs.name, cs.student_no studentNo, so.name className FROM ep_adviser_student eas LEFT JOIN cc_student cs ON eas.student_id = cs.id LEFT JOIN sys_office so ON so.type = 3 AND so.id = cs.class_id WHERE eas.is_del = 0 AND eas.grade = #{grade} AND eas.major_id = #{majorId} AND eas.teacher_id = #{teacherId}

SELECT cs.id,cs.name,cs.student_no studentNo,so.name className FROM cc_course_periode ccp LEFT JOIN cc_educlass_student ces ON ces.class_id = ccp.class_id AND ces.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN ep_adviser_student eas ON ccp.period_date = eas.grade AND ccp.major_id = eas.major_id AND ces.student_id = eas.student_id AND eas.is_del=0 left join cc_student cs on cs.id=ces.student_id left join sys_office so on so.type=3 and so.id=cs.class_id WHERE ccp.major_id=#{majorId} and ccp.period_date=#{grade} and ccp.course_type = 2 and ccp.is_del=0 and eas.id IS NULL
